name: com.unity.timeline
description: Use Unity Timeline to create cinematic content, game-play sequences, audio sequences, and complex particle effects.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed

- TimelineAsset.EditorSettings.SetStandardFrameRate would incorrectly throw an ArgumentException if given a valid StandardFrameRates, this has been corrected.

samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to create custom timeline tracks, clips, markers and actions.
This sample demonstrates how Timeline can be used to create a small in-game moment, using built-in Timeline tracks.
